slides.title: Integrations

content.headline: Connect Everything You Use
content.subhead: Browse and install integrations in minutes

slides.narration: Your business uses multiple tools—they should talk to each other. Our integration marketplace connects your favorite apps so data flows automatically. No more copying between systems.

slides.title: What You'll Learn
slides.narration: We'll explore available integrations, walk through installing and configuring them, show you data sync options, and cover managing your connections over time.

slides.title: Step 1: Browse Marketplace
slides.narration: Browse the marketplace by category. CRM and sales tools like HubSpot, Salesforce, Pipedrive. Email marketing like Mailchimp and Constant Contact. Scheduling tools like Calendly and Acuity. Payment processors like Stripe, Square, PayPal. Social platforms. Accounting software. Search for specific tools or browse categories.

slides.title: Step 2: Install Integration
slides.narration: Installing is simple. Click on the integration you want. Review what data will sync between systems. Click Connect. Sign in to the other service to authorize the connection. Configure sync settings—what syncs and how often. Most integrations take under two minutes to set up.

slides.title: Step 3: Configure Sync
slides.narration: Configure how data syncs. One-way or two-way—does data flow both directions? Field mapping—which fields in one system match the other? Sync frequency—real-time or on a schedule? What triggers the sync—new records, updates, or both? Conflict resolution—if both systems have different data, which wins?

slides.title: Step 4: Monitor and Manage
slides.narration: Manage your connections. Check sync status in your dashboard—green means healthy. Review error logs periodically for failed syncs. Re-authorize when prompted—tokens expire. Update field mappings if either system adds new fields. Disconnect integrations you're no longer using to keep things clean.

slides.title: Pro Tips

tips: Test with one record before bulk sync
Document your integrations for your team

slides.narration: Integration pro tips. Test with one record before doing a bulk sync—make sure data maps correctly. Start with your most-used tool for biggest impact. Document your integrations so team members understand the data flow. Check the marketplace quarterly—we add new integrations regularly.

slides.title: Start Connecting
slides.narration: Ready to connect your tools? Browse the integration marketplace now. Don't see what you need? Request an integration and we'll add it to our roadmap. Your tools should work together seamlessly.
